original_title: La Muerte de La Reina Insecto
overview: Irma (40) is a widow with agoraphobia and thanatophobia who collects dead insects in a small chest.  He lives in the south of Chile in one of the rooms of his big house with his son Adrián (22).  One day, Adrián gives her the news that he must go to do his drag queen show out of town for a few days, so she must stay home alone and face her fears materialized in the Queen of Insects.
title: La Muerte de La Reina Insecto
